review: Dr kamat is truly the best dentist I have ever visited.I spent a total of 9-10 hours on his dental chair over a period of 4 days.All my treatment was done within the week.He even postponed his other clients appointment to accommodate my treatment as I was traveling that week.My treatment was root canals,fillings,                   cleaning and polishing.He was gentle and a real professional, during the entire          process he  kept talking to me and showing me the procedure that he was carrying out on my teeth.My teeth are very sensitive and I was having a lot of problems chewing any food prior to the treatment.Its been three weeks since my treatment and am now able to eat all my food without any pain.Thanks to Dr Kamat.I have visited other dentist before and most are interested in taking your money and getting you out of the clinic as soon as possible,not so with Dr Kamat.    His fees are very reasonable and most important of all,he is genuinely a very good and kind  human being,I would not think of visiting any other dentist for my treatment except this kind and gentle human being called DR Dattatraya Kamat

Dr Kamat is one of the best Dentists i have met. have been with him for last decade and he deals with great care and compassion and also great attention to detail. his treatment handling is amazing and smooth. often there is a sense of calm and reassurance when i get treated by him. a highly recommended doctor and his entire experience comes to fore when he treats for different issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr explained each step in advance + clearly painted full scope, planned schedules in advance and gave clear visibility of cost. Dr also explained- what will be required next. 

Very effective planning, skilled hands and optimal time utilization impressed me a lot. 

My root canal 1 + 2 bridges + composites for 10 + cleaning was completed in record 3 weeks with precision planning and execution by Doctor and assistants. I am very happy.

Full medical check done in minimum time,unlike going to private hospitals where your full medical check is likely to take a full day even more in some cases.this medical check took about half a day.Good staff and  you are move from one check to the next fairly quickly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Ive beem going to Dr Kamat for the last 20 years and he has done a perfect job in keeping my teeth in good shape.

review: *** ** *** ****.My daughter was very very comfortable.He explained the problem and made my 6 yr old daughtervery very comfortable.Hes not very expensive too. Has been our family dentist for a while now.Highly recommended

Dr Kamat & his daughter were very friendly & polite. I was  happy with the way Dr Kamat did my filling, & was taken in on time.All the very best Dr Kamat, & wishing his daughter  a  bright future in Dentistry.God bless.

review:
I know that he will solve the dental problems that I come to him with. His mere presence is so reassuring. Been my dentist for several years and has never failed me.
Will always recommend him to my friends.
